domain.name: Politician

text:
@marcorubio Where are you getting your numbers from?  Given the fact that counties are underreporting or not even reporting so as not to make the governor look worse than he already does, show your work.  
And 60% of hospitalizations because OF coronavirus is bad. Very bad.
